text: I had a wonderful experience at the clinic thanks to the exceptional service provided by two outstanding staff members. Miss Daya and Miss Mena.Their attentiveness, professionalism, and genuine care made me feel completely at ease throughout my visit. They went above and beyond to ensure I was comfortable and well-informed every step of the way. Truly grateful for their dedication ‚Äî a shining example of what excellent healthcare service should be!

Got ignored by all the receptionists even though I was standing and waiting at the counter. They actually treat you like you‚Äôre transparent, and look right past you. They don‚Äôt even see you nor acknowledge your existence, much less say a word to you.

The reviews here are accurate.
All I wanted was to top up my standard pills before I travel. Easy, would‚Äôve only taken 5 mins.

After having no one speak to me still, I turned right around and went to Union Clinic, located right next door, where I experienced professionalism from the staff there.

Please, no need to copy and paste the same old formal ‚Äúwe will investigate‚Äù reply here. I can see the same reviews have been made about the same issues, dating back from 7 years ago till today.

My helper went to Healthway Clementi West St Blk 727 for her annual checkup and she said the service is excellent.  the reception is friendly and helpful.  The charges are very reasonable too. Dr Lee is patient, friendly and very good.  Thank you Dr Lee and team...üôè

This is my family's go-to clinic. The doctor and staff are all friendly and knowledgeable. They took the pains to explain to me about how the chas card can be used to obtain meds for my child's chronic condition. Thank you for being so cheerful and nice. You made my day, Mena and Daya :)

3 receptionist on duty but all 3 ignored me for about 3-5mins while I was waiting at the counter to register my name. Moreover, they are very unclear in their instructions (eg. A lady placed a document on the counter for me to fill up without explaining the purpose of the documents etc). It was an unpleasant visit.
